item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: My favorite reads over the last few years. Book Author Finished Quotes Superforecasting: The Art and Science of Prediction Philip E. Tetlock and Dan Gardner 2021 “For scientists, not knowing is exciting. Itâ€™s an opportunity to discover; the more that is unknown, the greater the opportunity.” The Uninhabitable Earth: Life After Warming David Wallace-Wells 2020 “Climate change is fast, much faster than it seems we have the capacity to recognize and acknowledge; but it is also long, almost longer than we can truly imagine.
